/* 특정 게시판 게시글 갯수 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(p.pst_sn) FROM posts p WHERE p.del_dt is null
AND p.bbs_clsf_cd = #{bbsClsfCd}
/* 특정 게시글 상세 조회 */ SELECT p.pst_sn, p.bbs_clsf_cd, p.wrtr_user_no, p.pst_ttl, p.pst_cn, p.inq_cnt, p.ntc_pst_yn, p.crt_dt, p.mdfcn_dt, p.del_dt FROM posts p WHERE p.pst_sn = #{pstSn}
mapper.insert: /* 게시글 등록 */ INSERT INTO posts (pst_sn, bbs_clsf_cd, wrtr_user_no, pst_ttl, pst_cn, inq_cnt, ntc_pst_yn, crt_dt, mdfcn_dt, del_dt) VALUES ( UUID(), 'freeBoard', 'user_no_1', #{pstTtl}, #{pstCn}, 0, 0, Now(), null, null )
mapper.update: /* 게시글 수정 */ UPDATE posts p SET p.bbs_clsf_cd = #{bbsClsfCd}, p.pst_ttl = #{pstTtl}, p.pst_cn = #{pstCn}, p.mdfcn_dt = NOW() WHERE p.pst_sn = #{pstSn}
/* 특정 게시글 삭제 */ UPDATE posts p SET p.del_dt = Now() WHERE p.pst_sn = TRIM(#{pstSn})
